alert.note: Alert for Fairfax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:00AM EST until December 18 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern Virginia, including the following county, Fairfax. * WHEN...Until 830 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 500 AM EST, Gauge reports indicated flooding is ongoing along Accotink Creek in Annandale. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Annandale... Springfield... West Springfield... North Springfield... Ravensworth... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
